```{r}
#| label: fuba
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 7.5
#| warning: false

if(!requireNamespace('pacman', quietly=TRUE)) install.packages('pacman')

pacman::p_load(quarto, lubridate, tibble, ggplot2, patchwork, zoo)

dates <- seq.Date(
    as.Date("2023/03/20"), lubridate::today() - 1, by = "1 day"
)
weight <- c(48, 59, 59, 64, 71, 78, 85, 91, 92, 90, 106, 93, 99, 99,
            116, 116, 129, 114, 130, 134, 115, 121, 129, 117, 137, 137,
            158, 175, 230, 218, 223, 244, 255, 265, 266, 279, 295, 299,
            290, 290, 324, 337, 346, 356, 362, 371, 373, 398)

dat <- tibble::tibble(dates, weight)

p1 <- dat|>
    ggplot()+
    aes(dates, weight)+
    geom_hline(yintercept = 48 * seq(8), linetype = "dashed")+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/03/21"), y = 48*2,
                   label = "2 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/03/26"), y = 48*3,
                   label = "3 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/03/31"), y = 48*4,
                   label = "4 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/04/05"), y = 48*5,
                   label = "5 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/04/10"), y = 48*6,
                   label = "6 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/04/15"), y = 48*7,
                   label = "7 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_label(aes(x = as.Date("2023/04/20"), y = 48*8,
                   label = "8 times\ninitial weight"))+
    geom_point(size = 2)+
    geom_line()+
    scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 day", date_labels = "%m-%d")+
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(50, 400, by = 25))+
    labs(x = NULL, y = NULL,
         title = "Fubá's daily development, in grams")+
    theme_minimal(base_size = 14)

diffs <- numeric(length(weight) - 1)

for (i in seq(length(diffs))) diffs[i] <- weight[i + 1] - weight[i]

datd <- tibble::tibble(dates, diffs = c(NA, diffs))

p2 <- datd|>
    ggplot()+
    aes(dates, diffs)+
    geom_hline(yintercept = mean(diffs), linetype = "dashed")+
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, size = 0.5)+
    geom_point(size = 2)+
    geom_line()+
    geom_line(aes(x = dates, y = zoo::rollmean(diffs, k = 7, fill = 0)),
              color = "brown", size = 0.75)+
    scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 day", date_labels = "%m-%d")+
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(-20, 55, by = 7.5))+
    labs(x = NULL,  y = NULL,
         title = paste(
             "Daily gain", round(mean(diffs), 2), "in average"
         ),
         subtitle = "Weekly moving averages")+
    theme_minimal(base_size = 14)+
    theme(plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "brown"))

p1 + p2 + patchwork::plot_layout(nrow = 2, heights = c(1, 0.75))

```
